item.title: Inteljs_shortcuts
item.description: Shortcut Detail cmd + shift + a Universal Shortcut cmd + 1 Toggle side bar cmd + shift + t Refactoring menu f2 Go to highlighted error opt + f12 Open terminal opt + enter suggestions

item.title: Java Programming
item.description: Java was originally developed by James Gosling at Sun Microsystems in 1995. It is object oriented language. Simple Program in java. class HelloWorld{ public static void main(String[] args){ System.out.println("Hello World"); } } Guidelines Class names should be capital. It’s better to have one class in one file Name file same as class name it contains. Primitive Data Types Data type Size short 8 bit byte int 32 bit double 64 bit float Constructor Method Overloading Method Overriding static Keyword Declares the method or variable within the class scope instead of the instances.
